name: What A Day
description:
Instructions:

  1. Download
  2. Unzip
  3. Run the .exe
  4. Enjoy!

“What A Day” is a narrative game to help the player understand how a person with chronic illness runs out of energy through daily tasks. The character, Green, wakes up with a certain amount of spoons each day and she has to make the best use of them despite the numerous amount of tasks she meets on the way during her day. Each task, requires spoons and sometimes, there are more tasks than spoons. The only reward is a goodnight’s sleep.
